'''''Amon Hen'' 249''' is the two-hundred-and-forty-ninth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in September [[2014]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''[[Bilbo Baggins|Bilbo]]'s Library Study''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]]
* Contents
* Additional decorative artwork
** By: Susanne Stopfel
* Announcements
* Advert: Beyond Bree Calendar 2015
* The Burning Palantír 9
** By: Ian Collier
* All Brân
** By: Ian Spittlehouse
* [[Hall of Fire]]
** By: Lynn Forest-Hill/Verne Walker
* Report: 40th Oxonmoot A First-timer's Account
** By: Anna Milon
* Report: "Journeys in Middle-earth" Exhibition
** By: Gordon Palmer
* Report: Loncon 3
** By: Jessica Yates
* Another Andrew Butler
** By: [[Robert S. Blackham|Bob Blackham]]
* [[Orophin]] dreams of the Waters of Awakening Part Two
** By: David Marley
* A Naturalist's Guide to [[Lothlórien]]'s [[Mallorn]] trees
** By: Adam Morgan
* Letters
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Ian Collier
* Review: ''The Season Saga''
** By: [[Mark T. Hooker]]
* Review: ''Gatemoodle''
** By: Kevan Manwaring
* Review: ''Desiring Dragons''
